question:
[Gregory] and his sister, [Jamie] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Dustin] has a aunt named [Jamie], routinely he went to school with his aunt [Thomas] and his sister [Cecil] have been best friends ever since childhood. [Christopher] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Cecil]. [Roger] took his dad [Carlos] to the game. [Roger]'s son [Dustin] was going to be playing [Mary] took her father, [Carlos], out to dinner. [Thomas] took his son [Gregory] out for pizza.
Question: How is [Christopher] related to [Mary]?
